item.title: Muting low-quality sources: A field experiment to mitigate the harm of inaccurate health information online
item.description: Overview The template produces an academic presentation using LaTeX with the Beamer class . The presentation carefully follows typographical best practices and has a minimalist design. The goal is to produce slides that convey information as effectively as possibleâ€”complementing the talk, not distracting from it. Download LaTeX template for academic presentations Presentation obtained from the template Features The aspect ratio is set to 4:3. There are no frills at the periphery of the slides.
